benchmark_details.name: SeriesBench
benchmark_details.overview: SeriesBench is a novel benchmark designed to evaluate Multi-modal Large Language Models' (MLLMs) understanding of narrative-driven drama series through 105 curated series and 28 specialized tasks that require deep narrative comprehension.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively evaluate MLLMs' narrative understanding capabilities across interconnected series.

data.source: 105 selected narrative-driven series from Kuaishou platform containing 1,072 videos.
data.annotation: Annotations by over 30 professional annotators with rigorous quality checks.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are derived based on the predicted versus actual outcomes for various question types.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and scores indicate better model performance on the narrative understanding tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Human performance reported at approximately 95.8% accuracy.
methodology.validation: Stratified random sampling for training, validation, and test splits.
